author: Ross Burden
method: Heat the oil in a wok. Add the leek and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until cooked through. Add the wine, garlic, salt and sesame seeds.  Finish cooking for a further two minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 leek, sliced,  splash rice wine/white wine,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  pinch salt,  1 tbsp sesame seeds
